testsuite.name: org.jasome.metrics.calculators.SpecializationIndexCalculatorSpec

testcase.name: calculate depth and use maximum even if a minimum path to a root node is shorter
calculate depth uses the correct class when classes have same name
calculate depth uses the correct class even if it's not the closest class when classes have same name
calculate number of overridden methods works when the overriding method doesn't use the same parameter names
does not double count methods in the inheritance hierarchy
